p: In Latin America and the Caribbean, the recent epidemics of mosquito-borne arboviruses, including the chikungunya virus (CHIKV) and Zika virus (ZIKV), combined with the preexistence of the dengue virus (DENV) ( 1, 2), have resulted in the circulation of three substantially pathogenic arboviruses that exhibit similar acute symptoms ( 3- 6).
